meanings.definition: A long, slender Turkish tobacco pipe with a bowl made from a gourd.
meanings.sent1: He admired the intricate design of the chibouks in the shop.
meanings.sent2: The old man enjoyed smoking his chibouks on the porch.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the chibouks, mistaking them for toys.
meanings.sent4: His collection of chibouks was a symbol of his travels around the world.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chibouks lingered in the room long after they were put away.

meanings.sent1: He would often chibouks after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: People gathered around the fire to chibouks and share stories.
meanings.sent3: She chibouksed so much that her friends jokingly called her 'smoky'.
meanings.sent4: The chimney chibouksed smoke into the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The dragon in the story would chibouks to relax its fiery breath.
